title: (x) Ecover logo fonts - Futura, Cachet {Stephen}
content:
Hi everyone, i need to know the name of the two fonts in this logo... they seem quite well known, but i just can't remember! grrr  
Please help me, thank you!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141018045727im_/http:/typophile.com/files/eco_4810.jpg)
author: kalimane

comments.content:
Top is [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20141018045727/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/futura_std_extra_bold_condensed_ot/?sample_text=ECOVER&sample_size=96).  
Bottom is [Cachet](http://web.archive.org/web/20141018045727/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/376692648). Know this one because I've noticed the [packages](http://web.archive.org/web/20141018045727/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/5946899/) myself.
damn it coles! that was too fast.
yoohoo, thank you so much! you are damn fast, zedvox is right.
BTW We had this one already. A simple search would've turned up [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20141018045727/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19180). ;^)
